word:
Voice Culture, the Teaching of.--Education includes the important work of voice culture. The students are to be taught to give their reading and recitations such expression as will make them interesting to the hearers. They are to be taught how to use the abdominal muscles in speaking, and this 


                                     -365- 

study will prove to be a remedy for many voice and chest difficulties, and the means of prolonging life.--Ms 83, 1908.
